snippet: The victory of a gay candidate amounts to a sea change in conservative Poland, where the Catholic Church wields enormous political power.
abstract: Robert Biedron, with his election as mayor of Slusk, Poland, becomes country's second openly gay mayor; his victory is sea change in conservative Poland, where Roman Catholic Church has extensive political power.
lead_paragraph: The victory of a gay candidate amounts to a sea change in conservative Poland, where the Catholic Church wields enormous political power.

headline.main: A Gay Mayor in Poland? No Big Deal
headline.print_headline: A Gay Mayor in Poland? No Big Deal
